# kerasgenerator <img src='man/figures/logo.svg' align='right' height='139'/>

The `kerasgenerator` package provided a collection of data generators that could help in data generating process for various deep learning tasks using `keras`.

## Installation

You can install the development version of `kerasgenerator` using:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("bagasbgy/kerasgenerator")
```
